sentences.en: Bland vegetables are often served with a piquant sauce.
sentences.cn: 清淡的蔬菜常以辛辣的沙司调味.

sentences.en: But in every semifinal and piquant regret for a man who did not deserve to lose.
sentences.cn: 但是在每一场半决赛中,都会给本不该失败的人留下深深的遗憾.

sentences.en: It is quite piquant, also keep a little while, just like this parrot.
sentences.cn: 就是挺调皮的, 一会儿也不停, 就象这只鹦鹉.

sentences.en: Often a drop of irony into an indifferent situation renders the whole piquant.
sentences.cn: 在本来平淡无味的情境里,加上一点戏谑的成分,就往往能使情境全部都变得有味.

sentences.en: Processing technology and product characteristics of delicious and piquant chafing dish seasoning were discussed mostly.
sentences.cn: 介绍了鲜辣型火锅调料的生产工艺及产品特点.

sentences.en: Strong strong little boy is the piquant king with my famous class.
sentences.cn: 强强小朋友是我班有名的调皮大王.

sentences.en: The piquant sauce added to our enjoyment of the meal.
sentences.cn: 菜中加些辣酱使我们吃得更加开胃.

sentences.en: The piquant twist is that Cohen had no idea who was writing about her.
sentences.cn: 很糟糕的是,科恩不知道谩骂她的人是谁.

sentences.en: There may well have been a piquant novelty about her books when they came out.
sentences.cn: 她的书问世时可能确有引人入胜的新颖之处。

sentences.en: Today, I was very piquant to work.
sentences.cn: 今天, 我干得很痛快.
